description: A conformance pack is a collection of AWS Config rules and remediation actions that can be easily deployed as a single entity in an account and a region or across an entire AWS Organization.

ParameterName.description: Key part of key-value pair with value being parameter value
ParameterName.markdownDescription:
Key part of key-value pair with value being parameter value

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

ParameterValue.description: Value part of key-value pair with key being parameter Name
ParameterValue.markdownDescription:
Value part of key-value pair with key being parameter Name

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Update requires: No interruption

ConformancePackInputParameter.description: Input parameters in the form of key-value pairs for the conformance pack.
ConformancePackInputParameter.markdownDescription:
Input parameters in the form of key-value pairs for the conformance pack.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ConformancePackName.description: Name of the conformance pack which will be assigned as the unique identifier.
ConformancePackName.markdownDescription:
Name of the conformance pack which will be assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z][-a-zA-Z0-9]*  
Update requires: Replacement

DeliveryS3Bucket.description: AWS Config stores intermediate files while processing conformance pack template.
DeliveryS3Bucket.markdownDescription:
AWS Config stores intermediate files while processing conformance pack template.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryS3KeyPrefix.description: The prefix for delivery S3 bucket.
DeliveryS3KeyPrefix.markdownDescription:
The prefix for delivery S3 bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateBody.description: A string containing full conformance pack template body. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.
TemplateBody.markdownDescription:
A string containing full conformance pack template body. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 51200  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateS3Uri.description: Location of file containing the template body which points to the conformance pack template that is located in an Amazon S3 bucket. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.
TemplateS3Uri.markdownDescription:
Location of file containing the template body which points to the conformance pack template that is located in an Amazon S3 bucket. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: s3://.*  
Update requires: No interruption

TemplateSSMDocumentDetails.description: The TemplateSSMDocumentDetails object contains the name of the SSM document and the version of the SSM document.

DocumentName.markdownDescription:
